description: Krauss` wife. She is proud and carries the name of the family despite the fact that she does not have any Ushiromiya blood. She is often afflicted by headaches. She is looked down upon by Eva because she is not truly of the Ushiromiya family. She often scolds Jessica, but only wishes for her to become a true heiress to the Ushiromiya family.
name: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
